mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT VALUES(PROJECT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, #{proSubject}, #{proExp}, SYSDATE, #{publicYN}, 'N', 'N', NULL, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate, MEM_COUNT as memCount FROM PROJECT WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER by PRO_NO DESC

SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate, MEM_COUNT as memCount FROM PROJECT WHERE PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER by PRO_NO DESC

SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate, MEM_COUNT as memCount FROM PROJECT WHERE PRO_NO=#{proNo} AND DEL_YN='N'

SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate, MEM_COUNT as memCount FROM PROJECT WHERE PRO_SUBJECT=#{proSubject} AND DEL_YN='N'
SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, MGR_YN as mgrYN, DEL_YN as delYN FROM PRO_MEMBER WHERE PRO_NO=#{proNo} AND DEL_YN='N'

SELECT BOARD_NO as boardNo, PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, BOARD_DATE as boardDate, DEL_YN as delYN, BOARD_TEXT as boardText, IMG_NAME as imgName FROM PRO_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND PRO_NO=#{proNo} ORDER by BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate, MEM_COUNT as memCount FROM PROJECT WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND PRO_NO IN (SELECT PRO_NO FROM PRO_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO=#{MEM_NO} AND DEL_YN='N')

SELECT PRO_NO as proNo, MEM_NO as memNo, PRO_SUBJECT as proSubject, PRO_EXP as proExp, PRO_DATE as proDate, PUBLIC_YN as publicYN, COMP_YN as compYN, COMP_DATE as compDate, MEM_COUNT as memCount FROM PROJECT WHERE PRO_NO IN (SELECT PRO_NO FROM PRO_FAVOR WHERE MEM_NO=#{MEM_NO})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRO_FAVOR WHERE MEM_NO=#{memNo} AND PRO_NO=#{proNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO as commentNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, MEM_NO as memNo, COMMENT_CON as commentCon, COMMENT_DATE as commentDate, DEL_YN as delYN FROM PRO_COMMENT WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM PRO_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND PRO_NO=#{proNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRO_COMMENT SET COMMENT_CON=#{commentCon} WHERE COMMENT_NO=#{commentNo}
UPDATE PRO_COMMENT SET DEL_YN='Y' WHERE COMMENT_NO=#{commentNo}
